Key Arguments: The legislation violates freedom of speech.
Past instances, such as during the COVID-19 crisis, show that what was labeled misinformation was later proven true.
Social media accounts were unfairly closed due to fact-checking.
Misinformation cannot be labeled without 100% proof.
The government and mainstream media are exempt from the legislation, which is unfair.
Notable Quotes: No one person or a group of people has a right to tell anyone else what they can and can’t say.
Many of what was labeled misinformation or disinformation was later found to be the truth.
I don’t believe the government get many things right at all yet are exempt. That’s a joke.
